name: huggingface_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Hugging Face in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling huggingface_search multiple times.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('article, main a[href]:has(h4)'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 15); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('h4'); if (!titleEl) continue; const spans = Array.from(card.querySelectorAll('span')); const name = titleEl.textContent.trim(); const link = card.closest('a[href]') || card.querySelector('a[href]') || card; const url = link.href || ''; results.push({ name, url, meta: spans.slice(0, 5).map(s => s.textContent.trim()).filter(Boolean) }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('search') || '', result_count: results.length, results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
